title: How to write a creative description - Quora

response.answer_text: So, kind of like when you answer the Who, What, Where, When questions for other types of writing, you'll want to do the same with descriptive wiritng, only using the 5 senses as a starting point. Then, as you go along, you'll want to include adjectives and smilies. Now, I don't mean like “really big/super smelly/very short” or cliches like “cool as a cucumber”. You want to show, not tell, correct? You want you reader to have an experience. So take those into consideration when writing a creative description, and you'll be well in your way to painting a picture with words!
